nodes.text: Falaricae was a MC40a light cruiser used by the Dimoks.
It had a squadron of Z-95 Headhunters and arrived as part of the attack against the Ripoblus convoy. Tan Maarek Stele inspected the cruiser to find it had Dimoks.

The cruiser also appeared at a meeting between the Ripoblus and the Dimok leaders that the imperials raided as well in an attempt to capture the leaders of both factions, only to capture their children.
